section.docs:
The API can give you statistics on individual or groups of resources.
**This functionality is a WIP!** Statisics may be added or removed as the application develops.
**NOTE**: Date Scoping will be implemented when a final set of statistics has been decided.
Deal Totals are given as objects divded up into currencies. Sums are given in floating point values.

section.title: Routes & Permissions
section.docs: * `GET /dashboard/statistics`: All users * `GET /statistics/deals`: All users * `GET /statistics/pipeline`: All users * `GET /statistics/coffee_cup`: All users * `GET /campaigns/:id/statistics`: User who can read that campaign
